line.text:
Planned Work
 Posted: 01/19/2020 10:22PM

TRACK MAINTENANCE
Jan 17 - 20, Fri 11:15 PM to Mon 5 AM
[1] Service between 137 St, Manhattan and 242 St, the Bronx is replaced by [A] [C] trains, M3, M100 and free shuttle buses


[1] trains run between South Ferry and 137 St in Manhattan.

[SB] Buses run along four routes making station stops on the [1] line:
1. Broadway between 242 St and 215 St, stopping at the 207 St [A] station.
2. Dyckman St between [1] and [A] stations late nights only. Use M100 days/evenings.
3. St Nicholas Av between 191 and 168 Sts. Free transfer for M3 service.
4. Broadway between 168 St and 137 St.

Use the [A] [C] trains for service to/from nearby stations in Washington Heights.

• Transfer between [1] and [A] [C] trains at 59 St-Columbus Circle.
• Transfer between [1] trains and [SB] buses at the 137 St [1] station.
• Transfer between [A] trains and [SB] buses at the 168 St and 207 St [A] stations.

 Posted: 01/19/2020 10:22PM

TRACK MAINTENANCE
Jan 17 - 20, Fri 9:30 PM to Mon 5 AM
[4] Service between Bowling Green, Manhattan and Utica Av/New Lots Av, Brooklyn is replaced by [2] and [3] trains


[4] trains run between Woodlawn and Bowling Green.

[3] trains run between 148 St and New Lots Av.

Travel Alternatives:
For service between Borough Hall and Franklin Av, take the [2] or [3].
Take the [3] between Franklin Av and New Lots Av.

• Transfer between the [4] and [2] [3] trains at Fulton St.

Reminder: [5] trains do not run in Brooklyn on weekends or overnight.

 Posted: 01/19/2020 10:22PM

TRACK MAINTENANCE
Jan 17 - 20, Fri 11:45 PM to Mon 5 AM
[E] Trains run via the [F] in both directions between 21 St-Queensbridge [F] station, Queens and W 4 St, Manhattan


No [E] service at Queens Plaza, Court Sq-23 St, Lexington Av/53 St, 5 Av/53 St, 7 Av, 50 St, 42 St/Port Authority, 34 St-Penn Station, 23 St and 14 St.

[SB] Free shuttle buses run between Court Sq-23 St and 21 St-Queensbridge, stopping at Queens Plaza.

Travel Alternatives:
For Queens Plaza, take the [R] (days/evenings) or use the nearby Queensboro Plaza [7] [N] station or [SB]. Transfer at 34 St-Herald Sq [N] [R], Roosevelt Av-74 St [7] [R] or 21 St-Queensbridge [SB].

For Court Sq-23 St, use the [7] at Times Sq-42 St/Port Authority [A] [C] or via transfer to/from the [E] at 74 St-Roosevelt Av.

For Lexington Av/53 St, use the [4] local, [6] via transfer to/from the [7] at Grand Central or [R] (days/evenings) at Lexington Av/59 St.

For 5 Av/53 St, use nearby [F] stations at 47-50 Sts or 57 St.

For 7 Av, take the [D] via transfer at 47-50 Sts.

For 50 St, 42 St, 34 St, 23 St and 14 St, take the [A] [C]. Transfer at W 4 St or from the [7] or [N] trains at Times Sq-42 St/Port Authority.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA stations.

TRACK MAINTENANCE
Jan 17 - 20, Fri 9:45 PM to Mon 5 AM
[F] Service between Church Av and Stillwell Av in Brooklyn is replaced by free shuttle buses


[F] trains run between 179 St and Church Av.

[SB] Buses run between Church Av and Stillwell Av*, stopping at Ditmas Av, 18 Av, Avenue I, Bay Pkwy, Avenue N, Avenue P, Kings Hwy, Avenue U, Avenue X, Neptune Av and W 8 St.

Transfer between [F] trains and [SB] buses at Church Av.

For direct service between Coney Island and Manhattan/Downtown Brooklyn, take the [Q] instead.

In Manhattan, transfer between the [F] and [Q] at 34 St-Herald Sq.

In Brooklyn, transfer between the [Q] and [SB] at Stillwell Av or West 8 St.

line.name: L
line.text:
Planned Work
 Posted: 01/19/2020 10:22PM

TUNNEL REHABILITATION
Every night from 10 PM to 5 AM and all day Saturday and Sunday
[L] 3 Av and 1 Av in Manhattan - board/exit all trains at the 8 Av-bound platform





Planned Work
 Posted: 01/19/2020 10:22PM

STATION & ACCESSIBILITY IMPROVEMENTS
Jan 17 - 20, Fri 11:15 PM to Mon 5 AM
[L] Service between Broadway Junction and Lorimer St in Brooklyn is replaced by free shuttle buses


[L] trains run in two sections:
 1. Between Rockaway Pkwy and Broadway Junction ([J] platform) in Brooklyn, every 10 minutes days and evenings.
2. Between Lorimer St, Brooklyn and 8 Av, Manhattan, every 20 minutes.

[SB] Buses run in two sections making all [L] stops:
1. Between Broadway Junction and Myrtle-Wyckoff Avs.
2. Between Myrtle-Wyckoff Avs and Lorimer St.

[M] trains run between Brooklyn and Manhattan, connecting with the [L] at 6 Av (14 St), Manhattan and with [SB] buses at Myrtle-Wyckoff Avs, Brooklyn during the following hours:
Fri 10 PM to Sat 1:30 AM • Sat 6 AM to Sun 1:30 AM • Sun 6 AM to Mon 1:30 AM

In Manhattan, use the M14A/D SBS buses serving all [L] stops along 14 St; the M14A SBS connects with the [F] [J] [M] at Delancey St-Essex St.

• For service between Brooklyn and Manhattan, consider the [A] [C] or [J] via transfer at Broadway Junction [L] [SB], or the [M] at Myrtle-Wyckoff Avs [SB].

[R] Downtown trains skip 49 St in Manhattan

For service from this station, take the [N] or [R] to 57 St-7 Av and transfer to a downtown [R].

Reminder: Late night [R] service runs between Whitehall St, Manhattan and 95 St, Brooklyn.

line.name: M1 - M116
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 01/19/2020 10:13PM

M10 buses are detoured in both directions because of a water main break on Central Park West between 102 St and 103 St.Â

Detour is as follows:Â

Southbound: Via Central Park West, right onto 106 St, left onto Columbus Av, left onto 96 St, right onto Central Park West, and then regular route.

Northbound: Via Central Park West, left onto 96 St, right onto Amsterdam Av, right onto 106 St, left onto Central Park West, and then regular route.

Buses will make all corresponding stops along the detour route.
